mapper.select: SELECT po.REG_NO, po.REG_DT, TITLE, CONTENT, usr.NAME AS name FROM POST po, user usr WHERE po.USER_NO = usr.REG_NO AND po.DEL_FL != 9
SELECT po.REG_NO, po.REG_DT, TITLE, CONTENT, usr.REG_NO AS user_no, usr.NAME AS name FROM POST po, user usr WHERE po.USER_NO = usr.REG_NO AND po.REG_NO = #{reg_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST(USER_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, PUBLIC_FL, DEL_FL) VALUES (#{user_no},#{title},#{content},#{public_fl},0)
mapper.update: UPDATE POST SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, EDIT_DT = NOW() WHERE REG_NO = #{reg_no}
